name: Billionaire, Inc. - Idle Merge
description:
As a capitalist, one single business is never enough, that's why you must strive for more! Establish your business empire, swipe and merge to discover new businesses, and place your desired business anywhere.
Upgrade everything and wait as your business produces money of their own. Believe us when we say there are no easier way for you to be a Billionaire!

Suggestions? Send us some through info@alegrium.com!
